General.Name: Socovesa
General.Description: Socovesa S.A. engages in the real estate development, and engineering and construction businesses in Chile. The company constructs various projects, such as houses, buildings, bridges, roads, dams, irrigation works, tunnels, ports, airports, and earthworks. Socovesa S.A. was founded in 1965 and is based in Providencia, Chile.
